suggest.spryker-shop/business-on-behalf-widget: If you want to use BusinessOnBehalfWidget or MenuItemBusinessOnBehalfWidgetPlugin.
suggest.spryker-shop/cart-note-widget: If you want to use components from module CartNoteWidget or CartNoteOrderNoteWidgetPlugin.
suggest.spryker-shop/sales-configurable-bundle-w: Add the module if you want to use OrderConfiguredBundleWidget.
suggest.spryker-shop/customer-reorder-widget: If you want to use CustomerReorderItemCheckboxWidget or CustomerReorderWidgetPlugin, for support of Split Delivery feature use (^6.2.0)
suggest.spryker-shop/gift-card-widget: If you want to use components from module GiftCardWidget.
suggest.spryker-shop/home-page: Widget plugins are available for this module.
suggest.spryker-shop/product-packaging-unit-widg: If you want to use components from module ProductPackagingUnitWidget or OrderDetailProductPackagingUnitWidgetPlugin.
suggest.spryker/router: Use this module when you want to use the Router.
suggest.spryker/config: Use this module when using plugins that need Config dependencies.
suggest.spryker/container: If you want to use twig plugins.
suggest.spryker/messenger: Use this module when using plugins that need Messenger dependencies.
suggest.spryker/silex: Use this module when using plugins that need Silex dependencies.
